#14 address bits for the index/set (1 address for each set)
#6 address bits for the byte select (1 address for each byte in a line)
#12 address bits for the tag
#
#
# 0 Read
# 1 Write
# 2 Read Instruction
# 3 Invalidate
# 4 Snoop Read For Ownership
# 8 Reset

#RESET
8 0000 0000

#READING INSTRUCTION CACHE TESTS
#Fill up A SetA 0000 0000 0000 01.  Each Should be a miss
3	0000 0000 0000		0000 0000 0000 01	00 0000		0000 0040
3	0000 0000 0001		0000 0000 0000 01	00 0000		0010 0040
3	0000 0000 0010		0000 0000 0000 01	00 0000		0020 0040
3	0000 0000 0011		0000 0000 0000 01	00 0000		0030 0040
# Check that lines elements of set are hits
3	0000 0000 0000		0000 0000 0000 01	00 0000		0000 0040
3	0000 0000 0001		0000 0000 0000 01	00 0000		0010 0040
3	0000 0000 0010		0000 0000 0000 01	00 0000		0020 0040
3	0000 0000 0011		0000 0000 0000 01	00 0000		0030 0040
# Check that lines of set are hits with different Bit offsets
3	0000 0000 0000		0000 0000 0000 01	00 0001		0000 0041
3	0000 0000 0001		0000 0000 0000 01	00 0010		0010 0042
3	0000 0000 0010		0000 0000 0000 01	00 0100		0020 0044
3	0000 0000 0011		0000 0000 0000 01	00 1000		0030 0048

#Make sure that a different Set can be filled with different tags. This should not influence previous Set
#Fill up A SetB 0001 0000 0000 01.  Each Should be a miss
3	0000 0000 0000		0001 0000 0000 01	00 0000		0001 0040
3	0000 0000 0100		0001 0000 0000 01	00 0000		0041 0040
3	0000 0000 1000		0001 0000 0000 01	00 0000		0081 0040
3	0000 0000 1100		0001 0000 0000 01	00 0000		00C1 0040
# Check that lines elements of set are hits
3	0000 0000 0000		0001 0000 0000 01	00 0000		0001 0040
3	0000 0000 0100		0001 0000 0000 01	00 0000		0041 0040
3	0000 0000 1000		0001 0000 0000 01	00 0000		0081 0040
3	0000 0000 1100		0001 0000 0000 01	00 0000		00C1 0040
# Check that lines of set are hits with different Bit offsets
3	0000 0000 0000		0001 0000 0000 01	00 1111		0001 004F
3	0000 0000 0100		0001 0000 0000 01	00 1110		0041 004E
3	0000 0000 1000		0001 0000 0000 01	00 1100		0081 004C
3	0000 0000 1100		0001 0000 0000 01	00 1000		00C1 0048

#Check that elements of SetA are still hits and that writing SetB did not interfer with them
3	0000 0000 0000		0000 0000 0000 01	00 0000		0000 0040
3	0000 0000 0001		0000 0000 0000 01	00 0000		0010 0040
3	0000 0000 0010		0000 0000 0000 01	00 0000		0020 0040
3	0000 0000 0011		0000 0000 0000 01	00 0000		0030 0040

#Read over SetA
# In SetA Read over Tag 0000 0000 0000 with Tag 0000 00001 0000.  This should be a Miss
3	0000 0001 0000		0000 0000 0000 01	00 0000		
# Check that Tag 0000 0000 0000 in Set A was written over by reading it.
# This Reads over Tag 0000 0000 0001 with Tag 0000 0000 0000.
3	0000 0000 0000		0000 0000 0000 01	00 0000		
# In SetA Read over Tag 0000 0000 0010 with Tag 0000 0011 0000.  This should be a Miss
3	0000 0011 0000		0000 0000 0000 01	00 0000		
# Check that Tag 0000 0000 0010 in Set A was written over by reading it.
# This Reads over Tag 0000 0000 0011 with Tag 0000 0000 0010.
3	0000 0000 0010		0000 0000 0000 01	00 0000		

#Confirm the State is as expected for SetA.  Everything should be hits
3	0000 0001 0000		0000 0000 0000 01	00 0000		0000 0040
3	0000 0000 0000		0000 0000 0000 01	00 0000		0010 0040
3	0000 0011 0000		0000 0000 0000 01	00 0000		0020 0040
3	0000 0000 0010		0000 0000 0000 01	00 0000		0030 0040



#READING INSTRUCTION CACH TESTS
#Fill up A SetC 0000 0000 0001 00.
#Way1
0	1111 0000 0000		0000 0000 0001 00	00 0000 			#Should be Miss	
0	1111 0000 0000		0000 0000 0001 00	00 0001				#Should be Hit
#Way2
0	1111 0000 0001		0000 0000 0001 00	00 0010 #Should be Miss	
0	1111 0000 0001		0000 0000 0001 00	00 0011	# Should be Hit
#Way3
0	1111 0000 0010		0000 0000 0001 00	00 0100 #Should be Miss	
0	1111 0000 0010		0000 0000 0001 00	00 0101	# Should be Hit
#Way4
0	1111 0000 0011		0000 0000 0001 00	00 0110 #Should be Miss	
0	1111 0000 0011		0000 0000 0001 00	00 0111	# Should be Hit
#Way5
0	1111 0000 0100		0000 0000 0001 00	00 1000 #Should be Miss	
0	1111 0000 0100		0000 0000 0001 00	00 1001	# Should be Hit
#Way6
0	1111 0000 0101		0000 0000 0001 00	00 1010 #Should be Miss	
0	1111 0000 0101		0000 0000 0001 00	00 1011	# Should be Hit
#Way7
0	1111 0000 0110		0000 0000 0001 00	00 1100 #Should be Miss	
0	1111 0000 0110		0000 0000 0001 00	00 1101	# Should be Hit
#Way8
0	1111 0000 0111		0000 0000 0001 00	00 1110 #Should be Miss	
0	1111 0000 0111		0000 0000 0001 00	00 1111	# Should be Hit

# Test that Tags Filled in SetC were not filled in SetD
#Way1
0	1111 0000 0000		0000 0000 0011 00	00 0000 #Should be Miss	
#Way2
0	1111 0000 0001		0000 0000 0011 00	00 0010 #Should be Miss	
#Way3
0	1111 0000 0010		0000 0000 0011 00	00 0100 #Should be Miss	
#Way4
0	1111 0000 0011		0000 0000 0011 00	00 0110 #Should be Miss	
#Way5
0	1111 0000 0100		0000 0000 0011 00	00 1000 #Should be Miss	
#Way6
0	1111 0000 0101		0000 0000 0011 00	00 1010 #Should be Miss	
#Way7
0	1111 0000 0110		0000 0000 0011 00	00 1100 #Should be Miss	
#Way8
0	1111 0000 0111		0000 0000 0011 00	00 1110 #Should be Miss
